</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns max load value of given container. Currently works only with uniform, vest and backpack classes.  </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''getContainerMaxLoad''' containerClass </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> containerClass: [[String]] - uniform, vest or backpack class  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]] - load value, -1 if not available. </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_maxLoadUniform = [[getContainerMaxLoad]] [[uniform]] [[player]];
_maxLoadVest = [[getContainerMaxLoad]] [[vest]] [[player]];
